titleStmt.title: OXFORD AND CAMBRIDGE ISLAMIC MANUSCRIPTS CATALOGUE ONLINE

msContents.summary: Prayers in Arabic with Turkish commentaries

msItem.title: al-Qur'ān
Sūrah 6
Sūrat al-Anʿām
سورة الانعام
msItem.incipit: الحمد الله الذي خلق السموات الخ

msItem.title: An Arabic prayer short pieces of the Qur'ān
msItem.incipit: يا جميل يا الله يا قريب يا الله الخ
msItem.author: anonymous
msItem.note: NOTE: This record has been automatically generated with minimal modification from the corresponding entry in a printed catalogue. It may contain errors. Please, consult the References section below for more information.
An Arabic prayer, on fol. 40a, beginning: يا جميل يا الله يا قريب يا الله الخ, followed by short pieces of the Qur'ān, etc.

bibl.ref: Ethé, Hermann. Catalogue of the Persian, Turkish, Hindûstânî and Pushtû Manuscripts in the Bodleian Library, Part II: Turkish, Hindûstânî, Pushtû and Additional Persian Manuscripts. Oxford: Clarendon Press. 1930. § (225) 2263.

msItem.title: Ff
msItem.note: NOTE: This record has been automatically generated with minimal modification from the corresponding entry in a printed catalogue. It may contain errors. Please, consult the References section below for more information.

Ff. 1-3 and 155-188 are, properly speaking, fly-leaves, filled by another, very uncouth, hand, with similar matter, on ff. 1-3 in Turkish; on fol. 155 sq. pieces of the Qur'ān, etc., beginning with the first verse of Sūrah 6 (see No. 1).

bibl.ref: Ethé, Hermann. Catalogue of the Persian, Turkish, Hindûstânî and Pushtû Manuscripts in the Bodleian Library, Part II: Turkish, Hindûstânî, Pushtû and Additional Persian Manuscripts. Oxford: Clarendon Press. 1930. § (225) 2263.

recordHist.source: Manuscript description based on the Bodleian Library's public card index of Arabic manuscripts with additional enhancements by the OCIMCO project team.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card (for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Admissions).
